headline: ON Semiconductor Earnings Beat Supports AI And Automotive Shift With Buybacks
summary: ON Semiconductor (NasdaqGS:ON) reported a positive earnings surprise for the fourth quarter. The company highlighted progress in AI data center, automotive, and industrial markets. Management disclosed the completion of significant share repurchases. ON Semiconductor, a key player in power and sensing solutions for automotive, industrial, and cloud applications, is sharpening its focus on areas that are attracting substantial investment, including AI data centers and advanced vehicle...
